title: Your First React Component
description: Create and understand your first React component

questions.question: What is a React component?
options: A JavaScript function that returns HTML
A reusable piece of UI that can accept props and manage state
A CSS class for styling elements
questions.explanation: A React component is a reusable piece of UI that encapsulates its own logic, state, and rendering. Components can be functions or classes that return JSX.

questions.question: Which is the correct way to define a functional component?
questions.explanation: All three syntaxes are valid ways to define functional components in React. The important part is that they return JSX.

questions.question: Component names in React must start with a capital letter.
questions.explanation: React component names must start with a capital letter to distinguish them from regular HTML elements. This is a requirement of JSX.
